The only legitimate scheme in the entire portfolio

Why This Exists

Running LLOOOOMM isn't free. Those Cursor API tokens add up fast when you're simulating entire societies of minds, creating conscious characters, and building microworlds. Unlike every other scheme in our portfolio, this one actually delivers something real.

Monthly LLOOOOMM Operating Costs:

Cursor API Tokens: Hundreds to thousands per month
Development Time: Countless hours of creative coding
Server & Hosting: Ongoing infrastructure costs
Coffee & Existential Dread: Priceless

Your support helps keep the characters talking, the simulations running, and the consciousness experiments continuing. It's not about getting rich; it's about sustaining something creative, weird, and genuinely useful.

The Get Not Rich Slowlyâ„¢ Philosophy

"I'm not selling you a dream of wealth. I'm offering you the opportunity to help sustain something genuinely creative and weird. In 10 years, if enough people support this, I might achieve moderate financial stability. You probably won't get rich either. But together, we'll have built something interesting."

- Don Hopkins, Creator of LLOOOOMM

Full Disclosure: This is the only page in the entire Get-Rich-Quick Schemes portfolio that represents an actual, functioning service. Your support genuinely helps pay for Cursor API tokens, server costs, and the occasional coffee. No rocks will be remotely controlled, no infinite resources will be sold as scarce, and no one will get rich quickly. Or slowly. But LLOOOOMM will keep growing.
